description:
The Straw Hats hatch a plan to rescue Robin, but as usual, Luffy can`t wait to find a fight. Will his impulsive attack derail their mission?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jouriku Sakusen Shidou! Mugiwara Ichimi Totsunyuu Seyo!
Landing Operations Start! Charge in, Straw Hats!
Opération débarquement ! Les pirates au chapeau de paille foncent dans le tas !
Прибытие! Команда Соломенной Шляпы – на штурм!
بدء خطّة الرسو! اقتحموا يا طاقم قبعة القش!
上陸作戦始動! 麦わら一味突入せよ!
